title: Mayonnaise(1999)[Choi Jin-Sil]
description:
Director: Yun In-Ho
Producer: Lee Chun-Yeon
Genre: Drama
Released: Feb 13, 1999
Production: Cine2000
Duration: 114mins

Plot
The mother visits her daughter suddenly and recalls the past to her mind. The daughter feels annoyed with her mother who complains of everything. She is pregnant and has 6-year-old boy, and she has to write an autobiography for another. Moreover, her husband went on business trip. At this moment her mother visited her. Her mother has been never loved by her father. Her sympathies was once with her mother, and she even loved her graceful figure. However, she was disappointed when she saw her mother put mayonnaise on her head when her father was dying. After that the conflict between the mother and daughter became deeper, and the daughter can not understand her mother even after that she herself became a mother as well. Her feeling to her mother stays unchanged even after she saw that her mother takes several medicines. Her mother feels bitter against her daughter for her cold treatment. When does the conflict between mother and daughter end?

Cast
Kim Hye-Ja
Choi Jin-Sil
Kim Seong-Gyeom
Gweon Eun-Ah
Won Mi-Won
Kim Yu-Seok
Mun Hi-Won
